text: Rolando Cubela Secades (1932 – 23 August 2022) was a Cuban revolutionary leader. He played an important part in the Cuban Revolution. He was a founding member of the Directorio Revolucionario Estudantil (DRE) and later the military leader of the DRE's Escambray Mountain front. In 1966 Cubela was arrested for plotting the assassination of Fidel Castro and was sentenced to twenty-five years in prison. Afterwards, he went into exile to Spain, and became a doctor.Jose M. Cardona (1998), Information Services on Latin America, ISLA, Volume 53, Issue 12 Cubela Secades died on 23 August 2022 at the age of 90.Falleció en Miami el excomandante cubano Rolando Cubela, quien intentó matar a Fidel Castro ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cuban military people Category:Cuban activists
title: Rolando Cubela Secades
